articles.description: The Socceroos took on reigning champions France, Mexico battled Poland, Denmark fought Tunisia – and worst-ranked Saudi Arabia shocked favourites Argentina.

articles.title: Saudi Arabia's victory over Argentina is the greatest upset in World Cup history, says data company
articles.description: Argentina has won the World Cup twice -- in 1978 and 1986 -- but at Qatar 2022 La Albiceleste wrote its name into the history books in an altogether different way.
